mapper.select: SELECT EQPM_NO ,FCLT_MGMT_NO ,(SELECT FCLT_NM FROM TB_FCLT WHERE FCLT_MGMT_NO = A.FCLT_MGMT_NO) AS FCLT_NM ,EQPM_NM ,EQPM_IP ,EQPM_STTS_CD ,MDL_NM ,EQPM_EXPL ,MFTR ,NFC_TAG_ID ,EQPM_SPC ,EQPM_MAC ,EQPM_MEMO ,EQPM_TP ,EQPM_OS ,REG_DTT ,UPD_DTT ,REG_ID ,UPD_ID ,EQPM_PWR_STTS_CD ,(SELECT MAX(CHK_DTT) FROM TB_EQPM_CHK WHERE EQPM_NO = A.EQPM_NO) AS LST_CHK_DTT ,(SELECT MAX(DEV_RNT_NO) FROM TB_DEV_RNT R WHERE R.EQPM_NO = A.EQPM_NO AND RNT_DTT IS NOT NULL AND RTN_DTT IS NULL ) AS LST_DEV_RNT_NO ,CASE EQPM_PWR_STTS_CD WHEN 'E05001' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EQPM_STTS_HIST H WHERE H.EQPM_NO = A.EQPM_NO AND H.GTH_DTT >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -10 MINUTE)) WHEN 'E05002' THEN 1 WHEN 'E05003' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END AS EQPM_ALV_CNT FROM TB_EQPM A WHERE 1=1 AND EQPM_NO = #{EQPM_NO} AND NFC_TAG_ID = #{NFC_TAG_ID} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert:
SELECT FN_GET_SEQ('EQ','TB_EQPM')
INSERT INTO TB_EQPM (EQPM_NO, FCLT_MGMT_NO, EQPM_NM, EQPM_IP, EQPM_STTS_CD, MDL_NM, EQPM_EXPL, MFTR, NFC_TAG_ID, EQPM_SPC, EQPM_MAC, EQPM_MEMO, EQPM_TP, EQPM_OS, REG_DTT, UPD_DTT, REG_ID, UPD_ID) VALUES( #{EQPM_NO}, #{FCLT_MGMT_NO}, #{EQPM_NM}, #{EQPM_IP}, 'E01001', #{MDL_NM}, #{EQPM_EXPL}, #{MFTR}, #{NFC_TAG_ID}, #{EQPM_SPC}, #{EQPM_MAC}, #{EQPM_MEMO}, #{EQPM_TP}, #{EQPM_OS}, NOW(), NOW(), #{REG_ID}, #{UPD_ID});
mapper.select: SELECT E.EQPM_NO ,E.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,E.EQPM_NM ,E.EQPM_IP ,E.EQPM_STTS_CD ,E.MDL_NM ,E.EQPM_EXPL ,E.MFTR ,E.NFC_TAG_ID ,E.EQPM_SPC ,E.EQPM_MAC ,E.EQPM_MEMO ,E.EQPM_TP ,E.EQPM_OS ,E.REG_DTT ,E.UPD_DTT ,E.REG_ID ,E.UPD_ID ,F.FCLT_NM ,(SELECT MAX(DEV_RNT_NO) FROM TB_DEV_RNT R WHERE R.EQPM_NO = E.EQPM_NO AND RNT_DTT IS NOT NULL AND RTN_DTT IS NULL ) AS LST_DEV_RNT_NO FROM TB_EQPM E INNER JOIN TB_FCLT F on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = E.FCLT_MGMT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND E.EQPM_TP <> 'E04003' AND E.EQPM_TP = 'E04003' AND E.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO} AND E.EQPM_STTS_CD = #{EQPM_STTS_CD} ORDER BY E.EQPM_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{endRow}

SELECT count( E.EQPM_NO) FROM TB_EQPM E INNER JOIN TB_FCLT F on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = E.FCLT_MGMT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND E.EQPM_TP <> 'E04003' AND E.EQPM_TP = 'E04003' AND E.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO} AND E.EQPM_STTS_CD = #{EQPM_STTS_CD}
